io.craigmiller160.school.service

Interface GenericJoinHolderService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GenericEntityServiceBean
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SchoolDataService

    public interface GenericJoinHolderService
    A generic interface for service class methods handling JoinHolder entities. These build on the basic CRUD operations inherited from GenericEntityService by providing operations for manipulating JoinHolders via the entities they contain.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    craig

    • Method Detail

      • joinEntities

        <T extends JoinHolder> void joinEntities(java.lang.Class<T> joinHolderType,
                                         java.lang.Object... entitiesToJoin)
        Join the provided entities together using the type of JoinHolder specified. If the specified JoinHolder type isn't appropriate for the provided entities, an exception is thrown.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of JoinHolder to use.
        Parameters:
        joinHolderType - the type of JoinHolder to use to join the entities.
        entitiesToJoin - any number of entities to join using the JoinHolder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the JoinHolder type object is not a supported type of JoinHolder, or if the entities provided are not supported by the JoinHolder type.

      • getAllJoinsFor

        <T extends JoinHolder,U> java.util.List<T> getAllJoinsFor(java.lang.Class<T> joinHolderType,
                                                          java.lang.Class<U> joinedEntityType,
                                                          int entityId)
        Get all JoinHolder entities that hold the entity specified by the provided type and unique ID. If the specified JoinHolder type isn't appropriate for the provided entities, an exception is thrown.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of JoinHolder to use.
        U - the type of entity that is joined.
        Parameters:
        joinHolderType - the type of JoinHolder the entity is joined with.
        joinedEntityType - the type of entity to get joins for.
        entityId - the unique ID of the entity to get joins for.
        Returns:
        all JoinHolder entities that hold the entity specified.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the JoinHolder type object is not a supported type of JoinHolder, or if the entities provided are not supported by the JoinHolder type.

      • getJoinCountFor

        <T extends JoinHolder,U> long getJoinCountFor(java.lang.Class<T> joinHolderType,
                                              java.lang.Class<U> joinedEntityType,
                                              int entityId)
        Get a count of the number of JoinHolder entities that hold the entity specified by the provided type and unique ID. If the specified JoinHolder type isn't appropriate for the provided entities, an exception is thrown.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of JoinHolder to use.
        U - the type of entity that is joined.
        Parameters:
        joinHolderType - the type of JoinHolder the entity is joined with.
        joinedEntityType - the type of entity to get joins for.
        entityId - the unique ID of the entity to get joins for.
        Returns:
        a count of the number of JoinHolder entities that hold the entity specified.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the JoinHolder type object is not a supported type of JoinHolder, or if the entities provided are not supported by the JoinHolder type.

      • removeJoinsFor

        <T extends JoinHolder,U> void removeJoinsFor(java.lang.Class<T> joinHolderType,
                                             java.lang.Class<U> joinedEntityType,
                                             int entityId)
        Remove all JoinHolder entities that are joined with the entity whose type and unique ID are specified in the parameters.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of JoinHolder to use.
        U - the type of entity that is joined.
        Parameters:
        joinHolderType - the type of JoinHolder the entity is joined with.
        joinedEntityType - the type of the entity to remove the joins for.
        entityId - the ID of the entity to remove the joins for.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the type of entity provided is not a valid type for this class's JoinHolder.
